thread.section_title: The Bryant Park Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of The Bryant Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: BubbaWon
title: Great location
text:
Bryant Park Hotel has a fantastic location and a friendly staff. I had a last minute event to attend in the city on a December weekend (always peak season in NYC) and ended up with a pretty dark room on a lower floor with a not-so-scenic view of a brick wall thirty feet away, but otherwise the room was nice and clean, with an excellent bathroom. If you plan on spending a lot of time in your room, you should ask for a room overlooking Bryant Park.
Room Tip: Ask for a room overlooking Bryant Park. You'll pay more for the privilege but it is worth it. See more room tips
